dataset.title: OFCCP Closed Complaint Investigations
dataset.description: The dataset consists of closed compliance evaluations, conducted by the OFCCP, since FY 2004. This data provides information on the OFCCP's efforts to enforce the EEO-mandated laws and regulations within the Federal Contractor Community (those companies which have been provided government contracts).

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs
